name: Mine-imator Project File
summary: Learn about .MANI files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Mine-imator can be used for making Minecraft movies published to YouTube and other video sharing websites.

description: File created by Mine-imator, a program used for making Minecraft animations; used as a project file and contains the animation timeline as well as the mobs, items, and terrain for the scene; can be exported to an .AVI video when complete.
